projects.title: Recomovi
points: Configurable scraper for realtime IMDb dataset and keyword generation.
Scrapes IMDb Advanced Search Page using beautifulsoup. Dataset of approx 8000 movies.
Rake to extract keywords from plot summary. Cosine Similarity Index to filter top 10 similar movies.

projects.title: MicroHMS
projects.description: Hotel Management System to track bookings and generate invoices.
points: Create & manage bookings, send booking acknowledgements via email
Store guest details and identification, and verify guests through OTP.
Role-based access to functionality, with separate access for admins and regular users.
Create and manage billing entries, and generate professional invoices using the system's built-in template.

projects.title: Vizima.in
points: The website was developed for an Indian hospitality company and features a modern and clean design, built using Next.js, Firebase, and TypeScript.
Contact & Registration forms are powered by Firestore NoSQL.

projects.title: carteakey.dev
points: Blog and Portfolio with a focus on minimalistic design.
Fast and Lightweight with a Lighthouse score of 97/100.
